mapper.select: select rev_content, rev_score, rev_menu from review where rev_date like to_char(#{thismonth}) || '%' and store_idx = #{store_idx}
select count(*) from note where note_date like to_char(#{thismonth}) || '%' and store_idx = #{store_idx}
select count(*) from reservation where res_date like to_char(#{thismonth}) || '%' and store_idx = #{store_idx}
select to_char(reserve_date, 'yyyy-mm') as month, reserve_time, count(*) as reservation_count from reservation group by to_char(reserve_date, 'yyyy-mm'), reserve_time order by month, reserve_time;
select reserve_time, count(*) as reservation_count from reservation where reserve_date >= to_date('2024-10','yyyy-mm') and store_idx = #{store_idx} group by reserve_time order by reserve_time;
